Question: On September 10, 2007, Letterman made his first appearance on The ____ Show, as its season premiere was filmed in New York City.
Hints: In 2005, this person was named the greatest woman in American history as part of a public poll as part of The Greatest American.
When **** was a child, her grandmother would hit her with a stick when she did not do chores or if she misbehaved in any way.
At age 41, this person had a net worth of $340 million and replaced Bill Cosby as the only African American on the Forbes 400.
